templates.name: Bloque crawlers malos
templates.expression:
(
  http.user_agent contains "Scrapy" or
  http.user_agent contains "seranking" or
  http.user_agent contains "Bytespider" or
  http.user_agent contains "GeedoProductSearch" or
  http.user_agent contains "opensiteexplorer" or
  http.user_agent contains "BLEXBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Barkrowler" or
  http.user_agent contains "GPTBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Yandex" or
  http.user_agent contains "AhrefsBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "CCBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "YouBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Omgilibot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Omgili" or
  http.user_agent contains "Diffbot" or
  http.user_agent contains "ImagesiftBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "cohere-ai" or
  http.user_agent contains "Timpibot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Webzio-Extended" or
  http.user_agent contains "SemrushBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "SEOkicks" or
  http.user_agent contains "Majestic" or
  http.user_agent contains "DotBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "LinkdexBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "SeznamBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "MegaIndex" or
  http.user_agent contains "Nibbler" or
  http.user_agent contains "Screaming Frog" or
  http.user_agent contains "SEOlyticsCrawler" or
  http.user_agent contains "AI2Bot" or
  http.user_agent contains "DataForSeoBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "GigaBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "MeltwaterBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "SeekportBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Shopify Partner" or
  http.user_agent contains "PriceAPIBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Datafeedwatch" or
  http.user_agent contains "intelx.io" or
  http.user_agent contains "Livelapbot" or
  http.user_agent contains "SMTBot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Spbot" or
  http.user_agent contains "MJ12bot" or
  http.user_agent contains "Nutch"
)
and not cf.client.bot

templates.name: Todo los que no viene de ARG pasa por Challenge Interactivo
templates.expression: ( not (ip.geoip.country in { "AR" "US"}) )  and not (ip.src in $whitelist_ip) and not cf.client.bot and not (http.user_agent contains "letsencrypt")

templates.name: Control Crawlers buenos paginas con parametros
templates.expression:
(
  (
    cf.client.bot or
    http.user_agent contains "Googlebot" or
    http.user_agent contains "Google-InspectionTool" or
    http.user_agent contains "GoogleOther" or
    http.user_agent contains "Google-SafetyNet" or
    http.user_agent contains "Google-Extended" or
    http.user_agent contains "AdsBot-Google" or
    http.user_agent contains "Mediapartners-Google" or
    http.user_agent contains "FeedFetcher-Google" or
    http.user_agent contains "bingbot" or
    http.user_agent contains "MSNBot" or
    http.user_agent contains "DuckDuckBot" or
    http.user_agent contains "Baiduspider" or
    http.user_agent contains "facebookexternalhit" or
    http.user_agent contains "Meta-ExternalData" or
    http.user_agent contains "LinkedInBot" or
    http.user_agent contains "Slackbot" or
    http.user_agent contains "TelegramBot" or
    http.user_agent contains "Discordbot" or
    http.user_agent contains "Twitterbot" or
    http.user_agent contains "Pinterestbot" or
    http.user_agent contains "WhatsApp" or
    http.user_agent contains "Applebot" or
    http.user_agent contains "Yahoo! Slurp"
  )
  and
  (
    http.request.uri.query contains "p=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "dir=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "order=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "mode=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "limit=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "cat=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "SID=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "criterion=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "color=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "size=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "price=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "brand=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "utm_" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "sort=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "filter=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "ref=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "page=" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "session" or
    http.request.uri.query contains "nocache"
  )
)

templates.name: AI Crawl Control - Block AI bots by User Agent
templates.expression: (http.request.uri.path ne "/robots.txt") and ((http.user_agent contains "Bytespider") or (http.user_agent contains "CCBot") or (http.user_agent contains "MistralAI-User") or (http.user_agent contains "Novellum") or (http.user_agent contains "ProRataInc") or (http.user_agent contains "Timpibot"))
